title: Update to fix bug
content:
There is a bug on v2.48.0 that prevents new tile creation on new empty tilemap layer.

Update to the latest version to fix that bug now.

title: HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY
content:
I hope you'll have a lovely Valentine's Day with your loved ones. To celebrate the magic of love, use promo code LOVE to get 30% off.

Best wishes
App creator, Son Nguyen

(This promotion is only available today)

title: SPRING SALE
content:
